text:
Gather | Mid-level Engineer | .NET + Azure | ONSITE London/Bucks/Herts UK | https://www.gather.tech

We're a _very_ small, friendly, early-stage software development team with a range of clients. Most work is web app development / CRUD. Software development offices based in the London area.

We're looking for a motivated, friendly software developer of medium (2-4 years) development experience to join a very small and tight-knit team on both existing and green-field development. Whilst we're not tied to .NET, existing projects are using that stack. Azure and front-end chops a bonus!

Initially ONSITE; once proven, home/office work is possible (with office days perhaps ~1/week). Lots of room for growth.

Contact us through https://www.gather.tech/contact-us
